thread.title: 10 Stocks Making Warren Buffett Richer in 2015
thread.title_full: 10 Stocks Making Warren Buffett Richer in 2015

title: 10 Stocks Making Warren Buffett Richer in 2015
text:
10 Stocks Making Warren Buffett Richer in 2015 Written by: Emily Stewart 07/30/15 - 12:13 PM EDT Tickers in this article: AXP CBI CHTR KHC MA MCO MDLZ REGN SNY TWC V VRSK VRSN WBC 
NEW YORK (TheStreet) -- You can't win 'em all, but Warren Buffett has stacked up a fair number of victories over the years. 
Buffett scored another big win at the start of 2015 when he teamed up with Brazilian private equity firm 3G Capital to invest a combined $10 billion to form the Kraft Heinz Company . The combined company is now the fifth-largest food and beverage entity in the United States.
